00012 #ifndef _PIECE_H_
00013 #define _PIECE_H_
00014 
00015 #include <iostream>
00016 
00017 #include <ClanLib/display.h>
00018 
00019 #define PIECE_SPEED 0.5
00020 
00021 class Piece
00022 {
00023   private:
00024 
00025   // For display:
00026   CL_Sprite *normal_sprite;
00027   CL_Sprite *appearing_sprite;
00028   CL_Sprite *disappearing_sprite;
00029   CL_Sprite *current_sprite;
00030   CL_Sprite *mini_sprite;
00031 
00032   static const int score[12];
00033 
00034   // For scores:
00035   int score_value;
00036 
00037   // For ...
00038   int piece_number;
00039 
00040   // Real coords on the screen
00041   float x, y;
00042 
00043   // Goal target coord
00044   int target_y;
00045 
00046     
00047   public:
00048 
00049   // Constructor
00050   Piece(int piece_number)
00051   {
00052 
00053     normal_sprite = NULL;
00054     appearing_sprite = NULL;
00055     disappearing_sprite = NULL;
00056     mini_sprite = NULL;
00057     current_sprite = NULL; 
00058 
00059     this -> piece_number = piece_number;
00060     this -> score_value = score[piece_number];
00061     x = 0.0;
00062     y = 0.0;
00063     target_y = 0;      
00064   }
00065   
00066   // Method to set the sprites
00067   void set_sprites(CL_Sprite *normal, CL_Sprite *appearing, CL_Sprite *disappearing, CL_Sprite *mini)
00068   {
00069     normal_sprite = normal;
00070     appearing_sprite = appearing;
00071     disappearing_sprite = disappearing;
00072     mini_sprite = mini;
00073     current_sprite = normal_sprite;
00074   }
00075  
00076   // Methods to display - be carefull, if current_prite is not initialized
00077   void draw(CL_GraphicContext* context = 0)
00078     {
00079       current_sprite -> draw(x, y, context);
00080     }
00081 
00082   void draw_mini(CL_GraphicContext* context = 0)
00083     {
00084       mini_sprite -> draw(x, y, context); 
00085     }
00086 
00087   void start_appear()
00088     {
00089       appearing_sprite -> set_play_loop(false);
00090       current_sprite = appearing_sprite;
00091       current_sprite -> restart();      
00092     }
00093 
00094   void start_disappear()
00095     {
00096       disappearing_sprite -> set_play_loop(false);
00097       current_sprite = disappearing_sprite;
00098       current_sprite -> restart();
00099     }
00100 
00101   void start_fall(int target_x, int target_y)
00102     {
00103       this -> target_y = target_y;
00104       x = target_x;
00105     }
00106 
00107   void set_normal()
00108     {
00109       current_sprite = normal_sprite;
00110     }
00111 
00112  // Return true if the piece is appeared
00113   bool appear()
00114     {
00115       appearing_sprite -> update();
00116       if(appearing_sprite -> is_finished())
00117       {
00118         current_sprite = normal_sprite;
00119         return true;
00120       }
00121    
00122       return false;
00123     }
00124 
00125   // Return true if the piece is disappeared
00126   bool disappear()
00127     {
00128       disappearing_sprite -> update();
00129       if(disappearing_sprite -> is_finished())
00130       {
00131         current_sprite = normal_sprite;
00132         return true;
00133       }
00134       return false;
00135 
00136 
00137     }
00138 
00139 
00140   // Return true if the piece is placed
00141   bool fall(float time_interval)
00142     {
00143       y += PIECE_SPEED * time_interval;
00144       if(y >= target_y)
00145       {
00146         y = target_y;
00147         return true;
00148       }
00149 
00150       return false;
00151     }
00152     
00153   void set_score_value(int _score_value)
00154     {
00155       score_value = _score_value; 
00156     }
00157 
00158   int get_score_value()
00159     {
00160       return score_value;
00161     }
00162 
00163   void set_piece_number(int _piece_number)
00164     {
00165       piece_number = _piece_number;
00166       this -> score_value = score[piece_number];
00167     }
00168 
00169   int get_piece_number()
00170     {
00171       return piece_number;
00172     }
00173 
00174   // Setters
00175   void set_x(float x)
00176     {
00177       this -> x = x;
00178     }
00179 
00180   void set_y(float y)
00181     {
00182       this -> y = y;
00183     }
00184 
00185   void set_position(float x, float y)
00186   {
00187     this -> x = x;
00188     this -> y = y;
00189   }
00190   
00191   //Getters
00192   float get_x()
00193   {
00194     return x;
00195   }
00196   
00197   float get_y()
00198   {
00199     return y;
00200   }
00201 
00202   void print()
00203     {
00204       std::cout << "-----\nnormal_sprite: " << normal_sprite << "\n"
00205         << "appearing_sprite: " << appearing_sprite << "\n"
00206                 << "disappearing_spirte: " << disappearing_sprite << "\n"
00207                 << "current_sprite: " << current_sprite << "\n";
00208       if(current_sprite == appearing_sprite)// && appearing_sprite -> is_finished())
00209       {
00210         current_sprite = normal_sprite;
00211       }
00212     }
00213 
00214 
00215 
00216 };
